movies.title: Animales de compañía
movies.plot: On occasion of the 65th birthday of Rafa his family gathers. A series of clashes occurs due to old personal feuds among its members.
movies.simplePlot: On occasion of the 65th birthday of Rafa his family gathers. A series of clashes occurs due to old personal feuds among its members.

biography.bio: Cristina Alcázar was born on September 17, 1978 in Elx, Alacant, Comunitat Valenciana, Spain. She is an actress and director, known for Gym Tony (2014), Cuéntame (2001) and El club de los suicidas (2007).
biography.name: Cristina Alcázar

biography.bio: Blanca Apilánez was born in Vitoria, Álava, País Vasco, Spain. She is an actress, known for L'étrangère (2010), Libertarias (1996) and La pasión turca (1994).
biography.name: Blanca Apilánez

biography.bio: Tatiana Astengo was born on June 7, 1967. She is an actress, known for Contracorriente (2009), Captain Pantoja and the Special Services (2000) and Promedio Rojo (2004). She is married to Francisco J. Lombardi.
biography.name: Tatiana Astengo

biography.bio: Francisco Boira was born on August 26, 1971 in Huesca, Aragón, Spain as Francisco Javier Zaballos Boira. He is an actor, known for Bad Education (2004), Todos los hombres sois iguales (1996) and The Haunting (2009).
biography.name: Francisco Boira

biography.bio: María Botto was born on February 10, 1974 in Buenos Aires, Argentina as María Botto Rota. She is an actress and writer, known for Risen (2016), Mad Dogs (2015) and Soldiers of Salamina (2003).
biography.name: María Botto

biography.bio: Enrique Escudero was born on February 9, 1963 in Cartagena, Murcia, Spain. He is an actor, known for El muerto viviente (2013), Los ladrones van a la oficina (1993) and Hours of Light (2004).
biography.name: Enrique Escudero

biography.placeOfBirth: A Coruña, A Coruña, Galicia, Spain
biography.bio: Nancho Novo was born on September 17, 1958 in A Coruña, A Coruña, Galicia, Spain as Venancio Manuel Jesús Novo Cifuentes. He is an actor, known for Lovers of the Arctic Circle (1998), The Red Squirrel (1993) and Astronauts (2003).
biography.name: Nancho Novo

biography.bio: Javier Pereira was born on November 5, 1981 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as Javier Pereira Collado. He is an actor and composer, known for Stockholm (2013), Al salir de clase (1997) and Que Dios nos perdone (2016).
biography.name: Javier Pereira

biography.bio: Miguel Rellán was born on November 7, 1943 in Tetuan, Morocco as Miguel Ángel Rellán García. He is an actor, known for Revolución (2002), Menudo es mi padre (1996) and Compañeros (1998).
biography.name: Miguel Rellán

biography.bio: Mireia Ros was born in 1956 in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Lidia Sentís. She is an actress and director, known for [REC] 3: Genesis (2012), Los violadores del amanecer (1978) and Alice in Spanish Wonderland (1979).
biography.name: Mireia Ros
